name: CarepalosWar
description:
This is my first videogame finished, was made in 2014, is a classical shooter ("hello world for game developers), it include various enemies, unblockable levels to win the game, a for point infinite mode with local leaderboards; you handle a Carepalo (Stick-face) that shot arrows; you see the healt in how many arrows the body has with injuries, and you see the ammo in back pack; there are a special power too.

was made in GM8, the ComunidadGM times.

gameplay
